snippet: This year's Holland Festival, through June 26, features a roster that includes "The Life and Death of Marina Abramovic" from the director Robert Wilson; "City of Abstracts" by the choreographer William Forsythe; the rousing show "Fela," directed by...
abstract: This year's Holland Festival, through June 26, features a roster that includes "The Life and Death of Marina Abramovic" from the director Robert Wilson; "City of Abstracts" by the choreographer William Forsythe; the rousing show "Fela," directed by the choreographer Bill T. Jones and a weekend entirely devoted to the rarely performed theatrical work of the composer John Cage.

headline.main: Stars from Robert Wilson to Wagner at Holland Festival
